definition: any of various long-tailed primates (excluding the prosimians), do random, unplanned work or activities or spend time idly
details:
noun
- any of various long-tailed primates (excluding the prosimians)
- one who is playfully mischievous
= synonyms: imp, scamp, rascal, rapscallion, scalawag, scallywag
verb
- do random, unplanned work or activities or spend time idly
= synonyms: tinker, putter, potter, mess around, monkey around, muck about, muck around
- play around with or alter or falsify, usually secretively or dishonestly
= synonyms: tamper, fiddle
